page.title: 02LOCAL CELEBRITY-IN OLDHAM
page.content: {GERTRUDE DICKENS}celebrated her 100th birthday on Friday with a family party involving four genertions. And the frail old lady wasted no time in giving her secret for a long life. {"It's just a matter of living rough {and ready every day,"}she said. The party was attended by the Mayor of Oldham,Councillor Alwyn McConnell, and her two grandchildren and her fourgreat-grandchildren. Gertroude moved to Oldham 70 years ago,having previously lived in East Retford and Sheffield. She found work in in a rubber facory in failsworth, but spent the rest of her life with Hollinwood Spinning company.
